about.details:
Established in 2014, Pratham EPC Projects Limited provides end-to-end services to oil and gas utilities in India. The company specializes in integrated engineering, procurement, construction, and commissioning.

The company undertakes gas pipeline projects including welding, testing, and commissioning. Pratham specializes in oil and gas pipelines and offshore water distribution projects and undertakes tendering and management.

The company is certified by renowned organizations as follows: ISO 10002:2018 for customer satisfaction, ISO 14001:2015 for environmental management, ISO 18001:2007 for occupational health and safety, and ISO 9001:2015 for quality management.

The company has completed more than 12 projects, with the largest projects totaling approximately ₹ 13,184.10 lakhs. As of March 31st, 2023, the company has six major projects. Five of them worth approximately ₹ 19,397.33 lakhs have been confirmed, but execution of projects worth ₹ 16,952.80 lakhs is still pending. One project has been completed with an order worth around ₹ 40,667.29 lakhs, indicating a healthy order book.

As of September 30, 2023, the company employed 770 people in various departments.

faqs.question: What is the Pratham EPC Projects IPO?
faqs.answer:
Pratham EPC Projects IPO is a SME IPO of 4800000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹36.00 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹75 per share. The minimum order quantity is 1600.

The IPO opens on March 11, 2024, and closes on March 13, 2024.

Link Intime India Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Pratham EPC Projects IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Pratham EPC Projects IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Pratham EPC Projects IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Pratham EPC Projects IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Pratham EPC Projects IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Pratham EPC Projects IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Pratham EPC Projects IPO opens on March 11, 2024 and closes on March 13, 2024.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Pratham EPC Projects IPO?
faqs.answer: Pratham EPC Projects IPO lot size is 1600, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,20,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Pratham EPC Projects IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Pratham EPC Projects IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Pratham EPC Projects IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Pratham EPC Projects IPO will be done on Thursday, March 14, 2024, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Friday, March 15, 2024. Check the Pratham EPC Projects IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Pratham EPC Projects IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Pratham EPC Projects IPO listing date is on Monday, March 18, 2024.
